hero.title: Independent Residential Houses for Sale in Civil Lines Gurugram
description: Civil Lines Gurugram is one of the most established and prestigious residential localities in the city, known for its calm environment, low-density housing, and central location. Buyers searching for a house for sale in Civil Lines Gurugram are attracted by its old-city charm combined with excellent connectivity to NH-48, Old Railway Road, MG Road, and key commercial areas. The locality offers wide roads, green surroundings, and a peaceful lifestyle, making it ideal for families who prefer privacy and comfort.

Houses for sale in Civil Lines Gurugram are highly valued due to limited supply and consistent demand. The area is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, government offices, local markets, and parks, ensuring everyday convenience. With its prime location and strong social infrastructure, Civil Lines remains a preferred choice for end-users and investors looking for long-term stability, lifestyle comfort, and reliable property appreciation.
